getPayPalP3

public java.lang.String getPayPalP3()

Returns:
1 or 2

getPayPalT3

public java.lang.String getPayPalT3()
Get the appropriate value for the PayPal Payments API t3 HTML variable, the type of period unit.

Returns:
M or Y for month or year

getPayPalSrc

public java.lang.String getPayPalSrc()
Get the appropriate value for the PayPal Payments API src HTML variable, the recurring payments boolean setting; 1 means recurring, 0 means not recurring (corresponds directly to the boolean autorenew data member).

Returns:
1 if recurring, 0 if not recurring

isAutorenew

public boolean isAutorenew()
Whether to create a subscription payment (with autorenew) or not

Returns:
true for subscription, false for one-time payment

setAutorenew

public void setAutorenew(boolean autorenew)
Set the autorenew option.

Parameters:
autorenew - true to autorenew, false to make a one-time payment
